channel.title: [Hyperion] 459 HELP!
channel.description: I Have a question about the server source Hyperion. How do i start a private server (Hamachi). Help Would be greatly appreciated. I want to learn what files do i need to edit. I didnt know what this would go in, because it includes both client and server questions. Thanks in advance.
